scripts.build-dev-ios: cp config_dev.xml config.xml && cordova build ios
scripts.build-all-ios: npm run build-staging-ios && npm run build-production-ios
scripts.build-staging-ios: cp config_staging.xml config.xml && cordova build ios --device --release && rm -Rf platforms/ios/build/staging && mv platforms/ios/build/device platforms/ios/build/staging
scripts.build-production-ios: cp config_production.xml config.xml && cordova build ios --device --release && rm -Rf platforms/ios/build/production && mv platforms/ios/build/device platforms/ios/build/production
scripts.build-dev-android: source ~/.zprofile && cp config_dev.xml config.xml && cordova build android
scripts.build-all-android: npm run build-staging-android && npm run build-production-android
scripts.build-staging-android: cp config_staging.xml config.xml && cordova build android
scripts.build-production-android: cp config_production.xml config.xml && cordova build android
scripts.test push notification: xcrun simctl push booted org.makesoil.staging.app push_test.json
scripts.test link: xcrun simctl openurl booted https://proxy.blink.at/diy && echo "NOTE: app must be in the background else routing won't work!"
scripts.test pw link: xcrun simctl openurl booted https://proxy.blink.at/reset?code=123346 && echo "NOTE: app must be in the background else routing won't work!"
